description.displayText: Lorena was extremely helpful to me this past year. She took great care of my apartment, my 2 kids and our golden retriever puppy. Lorena was always punctual, extremely reliable and very trustworthy. She was very careful in taking care of our apartment and did a great job as if it were her own. She had a very warm affection towards my daughters.  I trusted her to do school pick ups, play dates and after school activities in addition to her other responsibilities around our house.  I would highly recommend Lorena!
description.originalText: Lorena was extremely helpful to me this past year. She took great care of my apartment, my 2 kids and our golden retriever puppy. Lorena was always punctual, extremely reliable and very trustworthy. She was very careful in taking care of our apartment and did a great job as if it were her own. She had a very warm affection towards my daughters.  I trusted her to do school pick ups, play dates and after school activities in addition to her other responsibilities around our house.  I would highly recommend Lorena!

description.displayText:
Lorena has been taking care of our 3 children over the past 4 years. Our children loved her and we loved her. Lorena is very attentive with children. She was overseeing homework, playing games and organizing activities and playdates. Lorena is highly reliable, we knew we could always count on her. She did also a great job at taking care of the house.
We highly recommend her!
